# Quickshift (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]], [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, Celestial

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 104

For the duration of this spell, the casterâ€™s *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]* or *[[Teleport, Greater (Spell)|greater teleport]]* spell-like ability is quickened (as if enhanced with the [[Quicken Spell (Feat)|Quicken Spell]] feat). This spell has no effect on other spells or spell-like abilities.
